Translations.Text: He said This bol zlutovanie moj Lord When prophecy moj Lord pojdem ist okolo He zapricinit dam crumble prophecy moj Lord bol truth
O ze cas, my let them invade 1 iny potom roh blown my zvolat them all dohromady
My present Hell ze dni disbelievers
They bol jeden oci i zavoj see Moj odkaz! Nor could they hear
those disbelieve myslienka they get setting Moj servants gods Mna? My chystat disbelievers Hell eternal abode
Say ja tell ona zly losers bol
They bol jeden robota v this zivot bol totally astray they myslienka they robit dobry
Such je the jeden disbelieved revelations z ich Lord v schodza Him! Therefore ich robota bol v vain Dni Vzkriesenie they have weight
Ich iba requital bol Hell chrbat ich disbelief a for mocking Moj revelations Moj posol
Mat rad for those verit lead righteous zivot they zasluzit blissful Raj ich abode
Forever they abide therein; they never chudoba any inaksie zastupid
Say ocean je ink words moj Lord ocean run out words moj Lord run out vecer if my zdvojnasobit ink zasoba
Say ja bol ziaden inak than human ona inspirovat ze tvoj god bol 1 god Those hope schodza ich Lord zavodny righteousness never kult any inaksie god jeho Lord
